title: Booki
description: Integration of a responsive mockup using HTML and CSS for an accommodation booking platform. The project focuses on semantic structure, responsive design, and accessibility.

title: Sophie Bluel
description: Development of a dynamic website for an interior architect with project management via an API. Implementation of admin authentication and DOM manipulation in JavaScript.

title: Nina Carducci
description: SEO and performance optimization of a photographer's portfolio website. Improvements in search engine ranking, accessibility, loading speed, and fixing issues identified through auditing tools.

title: KASA
description: Development of a real estate rental web application using React. Implementation of routing, dynamic components, state management, and a modern user interface.

title: Mon Vieux Grimoire
description: Creation of a backend API for a book review platform. User management, permissions handling, image storage, and data security implementation.

title: Movie Explorer
description: Development of a responsive movie search application using React and the OMDb API. Implementation of dynamic search functionality. Focus on clean UI design, accessibility, and scalable frontend structure.
